column1: ha hona motho yatlayang hape ha ntate tebele
oo jwale ha oaya sekolong ke eng litlhare
na ha oaya sekolong ke eng
u motho ya jwang yasahlompheng batho babaholo
kapa ha ntate koma a teng
a wena dilamune tse diqetwa ke wena
ee rwala ka leotong lena lane
jwale ure pateriki ena adule kae
ke eng yona ntho eo jwale
tlisa pina ena ya sebina ketleebone
ee seka tswela ka mathe ausi
ke thaka wahao motho ya moholo hakalekale
skana lahla dintho tsena uaditlatsanya ntlo ena
e ke monna wahao yaungoletseng ke ntate tlala
jwale ke eng ha atlafihla hosasa
ere ke mme wa ausi masebina
thabang o hahae ha reye ee
ke yane mane moo hofetjwang pere
e ketlautsella mohla oo reyang nokaneng hohlatswa
ee setulo sena setlauthula mona leihlong
